articles.description: The US coronavirus outbreak has altered daily life in almost every way. Here's the latest updates on US Covid-19 cases, state reopenings, the government response, unemployment and more.
articles.content:
Every US state has begun lifting measures enacted weeks ago to curb the spread of coronavirus -- though daily case rates still are rising in parts of the country.
